What was Caranthir Ar-Feiniel's original: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel, a key figure in the Wild Hunt and trusted ally of Eredin Bréacc Glas, was originally known as the Golden Child.
How did Caranthir Ar-Feiniel become a na: Born from a project involving powerful elves, Caranthir Ar-Feiniel developed exceptional time and space manipulation abilities. These skills led him to become the primary navigator of the Wild Hunt, facilitating their travel beyond their home world. Caranthir was recruited into the Hunt after successfully passing Eredins trials, despite Eredins initial indifference.
Why was Caranthir Ar-Feiniel recruited i: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel joined the Wild Hunt due to his unique power to manipulate time and space, a product of Avallachs selective breeding. He passed Eredins trials, leading to his recruitment despite Eredins initial indifference. His pragmatic and secretive traits, as noted by Ciri, may have contributed to his acceptance.
What abilities did Caranthir Ar-Feiniel: Born from a project of powerful elves, Caranthir Ar-Feiniel showcases exceptional abilities in time and space manipulation. He serves as the primary navigator for the Wild Hunt, transporting them beyond their home world. As a potent mage, he relies on his spells and supernatural powers during combat, wielding a steel staff with lethal speed and agility.
